augmented_topic: Daily Routines and Habits (Science Fiction Theme)
objectives: Students will discuss daily routines and habits using Slang/Street register language
Students will engage with Science Fiction themed scenarios related to daily routines and habits
Students will demonstrate appropriate use of slang level vocabulary and expressions
Students will create dialogues combining daily routines and habits content with Science Fiction narrative elements

warm_up.description: Students explore daily routines and habits through a Science Fiction lens using Slang/Street language
warm_up.scenario: Imagine a futuristic or technological scenario involving daily routines and habits

main_activities.description: Students learn and practice slang register vocabulary related to daily routines and habits in a scifi context
Students engage in scifi themed role-play about daily routines and habits using slang register
Students create original scifi themed content about daily routines and habits in slang register

discussion_questions: How would you describe daily routines and habits in a Science Fiction scenario?
What technology or innovation might be involved in daily routines and habits?
Can you create a Science Fiction story about daily routines and habits?
How does daily routines and habits change when viewed through a Science Fiction perspective?
What slang register expressions would you use to discuss this scifi scenario?

role_play_scenarios.scenario: Science Fiction situation involving daily routines and habits
roles: Character A: Using slang register in scifi context
Character B: Responding in slang register within scifi theme

topic_genre_blend: daily routines and habits with technology
daily routines and habits with innovation
daily routines and habits with futuristic

teacher_transformation_guide.register_guidance: Use Slang/Street throughout: Casual street language, colloquialisms, youth speak
teacher_transformation_guide.genre_guidance: Frame all content with Science Fiction theme: Futuristic, technology, space, innovation

assessment.register_focus: Students demonstrate mastery of Slang/Street register
assessment.genre_focus: Students engage with Science Fiction themed content
criteria: Appropriate use of slang register language
Comprehension of topic within new context

methodology: Augmented CLT with Register & Genre Transformation
